argument.description: If numeric-expression1 is positive, a digit value of 5 or greater is an indication to round to the next higher positive number.
If numeric-expression1 is positive, a digit value of 5 or greater is an indication to round to the next higher positive number.
An expression that must return a value that is a built-in CHAR, VARCHAR, GRAPHIC, VARGRAPHIC, or numeric data type.
If datetime-expression has a datetime data type, the ROUND function returns datetime-expression rounded to the unit specified by the format-string.
An expression that must return a value that is a date, a time, or a timestamp.

description: The ROUND function returns a rounded value of a number or a datetime value.
